about_the_game:
Presence: Lookout is a "spot the difference" horror game - You play a surveillance worker, monitoring footage and looking out for anomalies. Anomalies can be anything from an object that has been moved to another location, rotated or even an unknown entity that shouldn't be. Report the Anomalies to win!

To file a report, Presence Lookout uses only your mouse to point and click (hold) on the anomalies, as well as your left and right keys to change camera, should you wish to. This control scheme means that the game is very easy to control and play for a wide range of people.

The game currently consists of:
- Regular content updates and bug fixes.
- 120+ Anomalies over 2 maps.
- 4 Difficulty modes.
- Language Support. I am looking to add more languages - Join the Discord Guild if you wish to help translate!
- Colorblind Mode.
- Horror Mode.

Our Plans:
- We have ideas for 14 maps, with a plan to bring many of those maps within the next year.
- Continue building the bank of anomalies across all maps
- To add more accessibility modes including Closed Captions, Text Scaling and more!
- Taking in all Player feedback and ideas. This means all bugs, ideas and suggestions will be reviewed for implementation!
- Player led Localization. Players are encouraged to assist in translation efforts!
